programme.title: Ô la belle vie
programme.desc: Sète, a family affair Overlooking the Étang de Thau to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south, Sète is a peninsula open to the world, welcoming men and women from all corners of the Mediterranean down the centuries. A crossroads for trade and historical culture, an inspiring town, vibrant with life! Presented by: Sophie Jovillard.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc:
Buttes-Chaumont
A major green space offering Parisians a welcome breath of fresh air, the Parc des Buttes-Chaumont is not only a jewel of the 19th arrondissement, but provides a fabulous panorama over the French capital. And, home to some surprising addresses, its surrounding area is more than worth a closer look!
Presented by: Yvan Hallouin.

programme.title: C'est la goutte d'eau
programme.desc: Summer 2018. Émilien and Mandine cast off aboard their yacht for a Mediterranean voyage. From Marseille to Lesbos they perform a play firmly anchored in the news. "Une Goutte à la Mer" pays tribute to the refugees and those who rescue them. A marine odyssey recounted by Bernard Lavilliers. Directed by: Yasmina Farber (France, 2020)

programme.title: Ricardo
programme.desc:
Shortbread, clafoutis and chocolate clusters
For a speedy solution when you need a sugar fix, Ricardo presents three recipes that only take a few minutes and a single bowl to prepare: chocolate shortbread biscuits, cherry clafoutis and chocolate-coated blueberry-hazelnut clusters
Presented by: Ricardo Larrivée.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc:
Buttes-Chaumont
A major green space offering Parisians a welcome breath of fresh air, the Parc des Buttes-Chaumont is not only a jewel of the 19th arrondissement, but provides a fabulous panorama over the French capital. And, home to some surprising addresses, its surrounding area is more than worth a closer look!
Presented by: Yvan Hallouin.

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: Cycling without danger Cycling in town, particularly with the family, is not one of the most reassuring of activities.

programme.title: Les contes de Lupin
programme.sub-title: Le frêle forgeron et le talisman d'Odin

programme.title: Massi en mission
programme.desc: The astronaut David Saint-Jacques challenges the YouTuber Massi Mahiou to prepare for a future space mission. But how exactly do astronauts train? What sort of experiments do they carry out? How do they live with zero gravity? Massi discovers all he needs to know about the mission and about space.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Rocky's bored
Today, Rocky is finding that time is really dragging. He's bored... Particularly as Lily has left him on his own without saying when she'll be back. What can he do to keep himself busy?
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: Ricardo
programme.desc:
Shortbread, clafoutis and chocolate clusters
For a speedy solution when you need a sugar fix, Ricardo presents three recipes that only take a few minutes and a single bowl to prepare: chocolate shortbread biscuits, cherry clafoutis and chocolate-coated blueberry-hazelnut clusters
Presented by: Ricardo Larrivée.

programme.title: Tandem
programme.desc:
3,248 km
Little Léonore has been snatched from a crèche during her afternoon nap, and the race is on to find her. The baby's parents were fighting for custody, with her father wanting to take her back to his home country. Was whoever kidnapped the child afraid of a judgement against them?
Directed by: Denis Thybaud (season 6, France, 2022) Screenplay: Thomas Perrier Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Baya Rehaz (Inès Zaïdi), Tatiana Gousseff (Sabine Mauriac), Alban Casterman (Célestin Morel) Genre: detective

programme.title: Tandem
programme.desc:
In troubled waters
Shots are heard on the shores of the Méjean lake, one of the rangers is found dead. The police quickly realise that the victim had been scheming in order to investigate around the stretch of water. Léa is convinced the victim was looking for something in the lake, but what?
Directed by: Denis Thybaud (season 6, France, 2022) Screenplay: Pascal Perbet, Lucile Brandi Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Baya Rehaz (Inès Zaïdi), Tatiana Gousseff (Sabine Mauriac), Alban Casterman (Célestin Morel) Genre: detective

programme.title: Épicerie fine
programme.desc:
Season: 2021

The Pays d'Othe et d'Armance

The Aube, at the Ferme de l'Ancre where Nathan Cholet grows wheat and produces sunflower oil. Christophe Duminil shows that apples know no limits. With Mathieu Hugo we discover the incredible woodland biodiversity of the Pays d'Othe et d'Armance. Finally, the Chaource AOP cheese and its history rich in flavour.

Presented by: Guy Martin.

programme.title: Au bout de l'enquête, la fin du crime parfait ?
Au bout de l'enquête, la fin du crime parfait ?
programme.desc:
Mysterious disappearances in Mourmelon
It's one of the most chilling cases in France's criminal history. In the early 1980s eight youngsters disappeared, one after another, near the Mourmelon military base in the Marne. The investigation dragged on for years before finally unmasking the culprit, a man deemed to be above all suspicion.
Presented by: Marie Drucker. With the criminologist Alain Bauer.

programme.title: Embarquement
programme.desc:
The Kaliningrad Oblast, a history of Franco-Russian relations (Russia)
France and Russia have a long history in common; notably in continental Europe, northern Poland and southern Lithuania. Alternately allies and enemies, the region has seen its share of war and conflict: the battles of Gross-Jägersdorf, Eylau and Friedland, along with those of two world wars.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Uber Eats
programme.desc: French football championship. Day 30. Lens/Strasbourg. At the Stade Bollaert-Delelis (Lens). 1st half-time. Commentaries: Didier Roustan.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Uber Eats
programme.desc: French football championship. Day 30. Lens/Strasbourg. At the Stade Bollaert-Delelis (Lens). 2nd half-time. Commentaries: Didier Roustan.

programme.title: Ma vie d'après
programme.desc: Episode 5 For Kévin, the Arctic adventure continues in a Sami village. In the Aisne, former pastry chef Flora is doing work experience at a primate sanctuary. In the Finistère, after a six-month course, Michaël works in a creperie in Quimper. In the Bouches-du-Rhône, Dorothée, former beautician, turns her hand to permaculture. Directed by: Paul Cabanis, Émilie Lambin, Marie Juteau, Clothilde Zins (France, 2021)
